member.name: STPFLAG
member.summary: Used by the method to specify tab properties.

member.name: STPFLAG.STPF_NONE
member.summary: No specific property values are specified. The default behavior is used: the tab window provides a thumbnail and peek image, either live or static as appropriate.

member.name: STPFLAG.STPF_USEAPPTHUMBNAILALWAYS
member.summary: Always use the thumbnail provided by the main application frame window rather than a thumbnail provided by the individual tab window. Do not combine this value with STPF_USEAPPTHUMBNAILWHENACTIVE; doing so will result in an error.

member.name: STPFLAG.STPF_USEAPPTHUMBNAILWHENACTIVE
member.summary: When the application tab is active and a live representation of its window is available, use the main application's frame window thumbnail. At other times, use the tab window thumbnail. Do not combine this value with STPF_USEAPPTHUMBNAILALWAYS; doing so will result in an error.

member.name: STPFLAG.STPF_USEAPPPEEKALWAYS
member.summary: Always use the peek image provided by the main application frame window rather than a peek image provided by the individual tab window. Do not combine this value with STPF_USEAPPPEEKWHENACTIVE; doing so will result in an error.

member.name: STPFLAG.STPF_USEAPPPEEKWHENACTIVE
member.summary: When the application tab is active and a live representation of its window is available, show the main application frame in the peek feature. At other times, use the tab window. Do not combine this value with STPF_USEAPPPEEKALWAYS; doing so will result in an error.
